setHighlightedTile

public void setHighlightedTile(int x,
                               int y)
Set the selected tile on the Map

Parameters:
x - The value 1 -> Configuration.field_width that represents the new selected tile
y - The value 1 -> Configuration.field_height that represents the new selected tile

setMapSize

public void setMapSize(int width,
                       int height)
Method to adjust the size of the Map you are editing. It does NOT delete all of the data in the ArrayList of ArrayList. However, it will delete tiles that are outside the new bounds.

Parameters:
width - The new width of the field
height - The new height of the field

getHighlightedTile

Get the tile that is currently selected

The MapTile which is currently selected
